casebody.data:
Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Lash.

[Cite as Disciplinary Counsel v. Lash (1993), 68 Ohio St.3d 12.]

(No. 93-1335 Submitted August 16, 1993 Decided December 8, 1993.) *14Geoffrey Stem, Disciplinary Counsel, and Dianna L. Chesley, Assistant Disciplinary Counsel, for relator. Roger M. Synenberg, for respondent. Per Curiam.

We agree with the board’s findings and its recommendation. Accordingly, respondent is hereby ordered to serve a one-year suspension from the practice of law in Ohio, with such suspension to have begun on February 19, 1992. Costs taxed to respondent.

Judgment accordingly.

Moyer, C.J., A.W. Sweeney, Douglas, Wright, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., concur.
